content: * to end 1 shell in last chain space slip_stitch in 3rd of 4 chain turn repeat round 2 until a total of 12 shorter mitten or 14 longer mitten rounds have been completed ending with a wrong side row turn thumbhole round 1 right side slip_stitch across 3 treble_crochet work in pattern to last v do not make the last shell in the last chain space do not join the round turn thumbhole round 2 wrong side slip_stitch in chain space 3 chain 4 treble_crochet in same v chain space pattern to last shell in last v 5 chain slip_stitch into 3rd chain turn thumbhole round 3 right side slip_stitch across next 3 chain 3 chain 4 treble_crochet into same chain as last slip_stitch counts as a 5 treble_crochet shell v into next shell as normal continue in pattern to end slip_stitch into 3rd chain turn next round slip_stitch into v 3 chain 4 treble_crochet into same v counts as 5 treble_crochet shell pattern as normal to end slip_stitch into 3rd chain turn repeat this round until a total of 6 rounds after the thumb have been completed from the wrong side 1 chain 1 double_crochet in every st to end of round slip_stitch into chain cut yarn & finish off thumb round 1 right side on right side rejoin yarn in the bottom v of thumbhole 3 chain 4 treble_crochet counts as shell in this v v in the top of next shell also v in side of the treble_crochet of the next shell double_crochet in next chain gap double_crochet in middle of top shell double_crochet in chain gap v in side of treble_crochet of next shell v in top of last shell slip_stitch into 3rd chain slip st across 3 treble_crochet of shell then turn round 2 wrong side 4 chain 1 treble_crochet counts as v in top of shell in same place as last slip_stitch shell in next v 1 treble_crochet in next v miss double_crochet v in double_crochet miss double_crochet 1 treble_crochet in next v shell in last v slip_stitch into 3rd chain turn turn round 3 right side slip_stitch across 3 treble_crochet of shell then work as round 2 but missing out the single trebles turn round 4 as round 3 round 5 from wrong side double_crochet in every st cut yarn & finish off sew in ends i m happy for you to do what you want with your finished mittens wear gift or sell but the pattern is copyright andrea denby and should not be copied without the designer s permission thank you happy hooking
